SELECT id, custId AS id FROM orders WHERE test_id="err_cases" ORDER BY title
SELECT orders.id, C.id, C.type FROM orders AS C WHERE test_id="err_cases" ORDER BY orders.id

SELECT id AS `$2`, custId AS `$2` FROM orders WHERE test_id="err_cases" ORDER BY `$2` LIMIT 1
